meanings.definition: A type of decorative glassware or jewelry designed by René Lalique.
meanings.sent1: She admired the lalique necklace for its intricate design.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop displayed a beautiful lalique vase in the window.
meanings.sent3: At the auction, everyone bid eagerly on the lalique pieces.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of lalique glassware sparkled like precious gems.
meanings.sent5: The lalique brooch shimmered under the gallery lights.

meanings.definition: To describe something as elegant or luxurious, like Lalique glassware.
meanings.sent1: He laliqued the event as a grand affair.
meanings.sent2: The designer laliques his creations to appeal to high-end clients.
meanings.sent3: She always laliques her outfits to look sophisticated.
meanings.sent4: The chef laliqued the dessert with edible gold leaf.
meanings.sent5: The realtor laliqued the mansion as a dream home.

meanings.definition: The act of collecting or appreciating Lalique pieces.
meanings.sent1: Her lalique was a hobby that brought her joy.
meanings.sent2: The lalique of rare items made him a sought-after collector.
meanings.sent3: Their shared love for lalique brought them closer as friends.
meanings.sent4: The museum hosted an exhibit celebrating the art of lalique.
meanings.sent5: His passion for lalique led him to travel the world in search of unique pieces.
